about_the_game:
Adds the following content to Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded-.

Equipments
･Doll Shield
･X-Mode, Activate!!!
･Heart Breaker
･Isolation Shield
･Kokoro Dream
･Kokoro Emotion, "Irritation"
･Kokoro Emotion, "Rage"
･Kokoro Emotion, "Delight"
･Daiyosei's Wings
･Zuura

[Attention]
Added equipments would be sold at the vending machine inside Hakurei Shrine.
detailed_description:
Adds the following content to Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded-.

Equipments
･Doll Shield
･X-Mode, Activate!!!
･Heart Breaker
･Isolation Shield

･Kokoro Emotion, "Irritation"

･Kokoro Emotion, "Delight"
･Daiyosei's Wings
･Zuura

[Attention]
Added equipments would be sold at the vending machine inside Hakurei Shrine.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 10 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 10 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 VRAM 3GB+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

short_description: Adds the equipments to Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded-.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
